scripts.install:node: yarn install && cd lib/app && yarn install --frozen-lockfile
scripts.link:modes: cd lib/app && yarn run cli link-mode ../../src/app/modes/*
scripts.link:extensions: cd lib/app && yarn run cli link-extension ../../src/app/extensions/*
scripts.build:dashboard: cd src/dashboard && yarn run build && mkdir -p ../../dist/dashboard && mv dist/* ../../dist/dashboard
scripts.build:app: cd lib/app && yarn run build && mkdir -p ../../dist/app && mv platform/app/dist/* ../../dist/app
